text: Instead of the usual money in the game, there are two types of currency: high-quality and low-quality material.
To get high-quality material, each garbage must be put in a container prepared for it..
For example, plastic is put in this yellow container. Please note that if you put in a different type of garbage, you will not receive the material.
There are other containers: blue - glass, green - paper and red - other types of waste.
To get low quality material, open the interface with the top button / I button on your keyboard, select the trash and click on the "Disassemble" button
To hand over the trash, go to the desired container, press the inventory button on the top / I on the keyboard, select the trash and press the "Use" button.
